item.title: Social Network Analysis
item.description:
I started this undergraduate research project in 2021 by studying the paper “Recognizing Power-law Graphs by Machine Learning Algorithms using a Reduced Set of Structural Features” written by Alane Marie de Lima, André Luis Vignatti and Murilo Vicente Gonçalves da Silva.

I have been studying some machine learning algorithms from scikit-learn library as KNN, SVM, Gradient Boosting and Random Forests. I made some experiments with NetworkX in order to understand how we can work with networks in computers. I am using graph2vec framework for graph embedding.

Advisors

  • André Luís Vignatti, PhD
  • Alana Marie de Lima, MSc

Experiments

  • Repository (GitHub)

item.title: ADEGA: Análise de Dados Estatísticos da Grade Acadêmica
item.description: This paper was published in Portuguese (BR). Análise de Dados Estatísticos da Grade Acadêmica (ADEGA).
